title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 11 December 2015 - XWiki
content:
<msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
08:15 <cjd> has quit  
08:30 <Ramona2> has joined #xwiki  
08:34 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
08:58 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:12 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:24 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:35 <tmortagne> quite a lot of failing tests on platform, we'll need to fix that today  
09:52 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:56 <tmortagne> vmassol: a few test are failing with "Can't find descriptor for the component [role = [interface org.xwiki.wiki.descriptor.WikiDescriptorManager] hint = [default]]" since https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/4f2f6fa823d3d222851f7001237b0bd5cee2d242  
09:56 <tmortagne> for example http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/org.xwiki.platform$xwiki-platform-wysiwyg-server/2257/testReport/junit/%28root%29/clean2/clean2/  
09:57 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
09:58 <vmassol> I haven't touched the wiki modules in my commit so I don't see the relationship ATM  
09:58 <tmortagne> vmassol: its not about touching it but using it  
09:58 <vmassol> just touched the webjar module  
09:58 <vmassol> ah yes I see  
09:58 <vmassol> I introduced the usage of it  
09:58 <tmortagne> like the new DefaultContextInitializer  
09:59 <vmassol> grrrr  
09:59 <vmassol> I'm trying desperately to finish the vfs module for 7.4M2  
09:59 <vmassol> will check thanks  
10:00 <Ramona2> has quit  
10:00 <Ramona3> has joined #xwiki  
10:08 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:09 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:11 <tmortagne> Enygma`: Hi  
10:12 <tmortagne> looks like https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/ce4d14b82299f350273c1de4fa28e0144e462d22 broke a few tests  
10:12 <Enygma`> tmortagne: Hi  
10:12 <tmortagne> the following seems related directly or indirectly:  
10:12 <tmortagne> org.xwiki.flamingo.test.ui.BreadcrumbsTest.verifyBreadcrumbInParentChildMode  
10:12 <tmortagne> org.xwiki.xclass.test.ui.ClassSheetTest.createClass  
10:12 <tmortagne> (on platform)  
10:12 <Enygma`> yes, I`m fighting with the tests to keep them under control  
10:12 <Enygma`> keep fixing some and breaking others  
10:12 <tmortagne> ok  
10:12 <Enygma`> I`m on it, thanks  
10:13 <Enygma`> though about the first 3 you specified, I`m not sure it`s my fault  
10:13 <Enygma`> will look into it  
10:19 <tmortagne> Enygma`: not sure either, just started when the commit ended up in github but maybe it's not relalated  
10:19 <tmortagne> \*related  
11:03 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
14:47 <tmortagne> has quit  
14:54 <vmassol> tm   
14:54 <vmassol> s/tm//  
14:54 <vmassol> starting to fix build issues I introduced  
15:10 <msmeria> has quit  
15:13 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
15:41 <Pbas> has left #xwiki  
16:18 <evalica> has quit  
16:20 <Enygma`> has quit  
16:44 <vmassol> I'm having a hard time understanding why DefaultHTMLCleanerTest is failing. It's failing to init the ThreadClassloaderExecutionContextInitializer which is injected a WikiDescriptorManager and this component cannot be found in the classloader apparently  
16:47 <vmassol> the only vaguely related that I can think of is that I added a dep on the classloader module in the webjars module  
16:47 <vmassol> but I don't see the relationship with the error...  
16:50 <vmassol> tmortagne: on http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/2256/ I see that it seems to have started failing after your change  
16:50 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
16:51 <vmassol> forget that  
16:52 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
16:54 <vmassol> ah I have an aide  
16:54 <vmassol> \*idea  
16:54 <vmassol> ok I think I get it  
16:55 <vmassol> it's just that classloader must be failing to draw wiki manager  
16:55 <vmassol> checking  
16:55 <vmassol> yes that's it, it draws the api only but at runtime it requires an impl
